alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 4:17AM AKST until December 28 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Damage to power lines is possible. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches are possible. Winds gusting to 60 mph and visibility less than one quarter mile is expected Sunday night through Monday night. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Sunday evening and continue into Monday night. Strong winds and blizzard conditions are expected to develop late Sunday night and continue through Monday night. West winds gusting to 60 mph are expected causing large snow drifts will form. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
